column3: Traffic;Kep: A truck overturned at 5:55 am on June 1
column8: Kep Province of National Highway 33.------The source said that the incident did not cause anybody to be injured.------The driver was named Soeun Roth
column10: a resident of  Kampot Speu province. The accident was reported as being caused by driver error.------The truck owner was allowed to repair the damage without involvement fro authorities.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/446488
